constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 17 (Thursday, January 28, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. SABLAN:
H.R. 560.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Under Article I, Section 8, Clause 4, and Article IV,
Section 3, Clause 2 of the Constitution of the United States.
[Page H251]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on the Constitution, Civil Rights, and Civil Liberties.

sponsors.fullName: Del. Sablan, Gregorio Kilili Camacho [D-MP-At Large]

title: Northern Mariana Islands Legal Residents Relief Act of 2021
